issue_title: [Enhancement] Add TodoStorage.count() method to get todo count without full deserialization

implementation.approach: Added count() method to TodoStorage that reads JSON file and returns len(raw_list) without constructing Todo objects. This enables quick status checks without full deserialization.
key_changes: Added count() method to TodoStorage class
Added 6 regression tests covering edge cases

acceptance_criteria_met: count() is faster than len(storage.load()) for large datasets (avoids Todo object construction)
minimal_test_plan_covered: Test count() returns 0 for missing file
Test count() returns correct count after save
Test count() handles empty list correctly
